title: About us
description:
Connection4Innovation is a Social Promotion Association, 
We create connections to increase the reach of local DEVELOPMENT exported to the global.
We connect visions, experiences and most of all: PEOPLE.
We move in the circuits of SOCIAL, European, community planning implementing current synergies (input) with high impact (output).
We, the founding members, have conceived it as open, MOTIVATED and in progress, responding to this question: 
If we are in a change of era or in an era of changes (the two are not exactly the same thing).
